title: Get available locations by advertiser ID

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language you want the returned region name to be translated into. Default value: en Currently, we only support zh , fr , es , ko , vi , en , hi , it , tr , ru , ja , id , de , ms , ar , and th Note : If you do not pass in one of the supported values above, it will return as the default en .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: region_level
fields.description: Region level. Enum values: COUNTRY (country or region level), PROVINCE , CITY , DISTRICT . DMA and metropolitans are at the province level.

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: Country code for the country of the region.

fields.name: parent_id
fields.description: The upper-level region id. This field will not be returned if region_level is COUNTRY .

fields.name: area_type
fields.description: Location type. Enum values: ADMIN , METROPOLITAN_OR_DMA .

fields.name: support_below_18
fields.description: Whether the location supports ads to be delivered to people under 18 years of age.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
